name: Getting to Know Grasses Webinar
description: The City of Toronto is honored to host biologist Natasha Gonsalves from the Toronto and Region Conservation Authority for an engaging webinar on grasses and grass-like plants. Discover the intricacies of identifying these elusive yet abundant plants within our urban ecosystem. Come with your curiosities and leave with the ability to distinguish between rushes, sedges and grasses, along with common examples of each and an understanding of their precious role in local habitats and landscapes. Grass ID's not just a field of dreams, it's a field of facts.

name: Etobicoke Youth Art Crawl Exhibition
description: Celebrate youth talent in this exhibition showcasing works in visual arts inspired by personal expression, communal engagement and creative exploration. A collaborative project by City of Toronto Parks & Recreation (Youth Spaces), Museums & Heritage Services (Montgomery's Inn), and Arts Services (Assembly Hall Gallery).
